MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL24 and LL25 postcode areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:09am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation works are required on the electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:52 AM on Sunday, 25 October 2020.
